text: The following is a list of the major rivers of Asia, by letter. See the articles for tributaries and other information. * Amu Darya - Turkmenistan, Uzbekistan - Caspian Sea * Amur - China (Manchuria), Russia (Siberia) - Sea of Okhotsk ** Angara * Aras -Turkey * Buriganga River - Bangladesh * Büyük Menderes( Maeander) - Turkey * Brahmaputra - China (Tibet), India (Assam), Bangladesh - Bay of Bengal * Cagayan - Philippines (Luzon) * Chao Phraya - Thailand - Gulf of Thailand * DicleTigris - Turkey, Iraq * Fırat Euphrates - Turkey, Syria, Iraq * Ganges River - India ** Ghaggar River * Godavari - India * Habur (Khabur) Turkey, Syria * Hai - China - Yellow Sea * Han River - Korea - Yellow Sea * Hari River, Afghanistan - Afghanistan and Turkministan * Huai - China - Yellow Sea * Huangpu River - China * Indus - China (Tibet), Pakistan * Ayeyarwady River - Burma * Irtysh - China * Jordan - Israel, Jordan * Kapuas - Borneo * Karakash - China (Takla Makan) * Karnaphuli - India, Bangladesh * Karun Iran * Kaveri River- India * Kızılırmak Halys - Turkey * Krishna - India - Bay of Bengal * Kolyma - Russia (Siberia) * Küçük Menderes (Cayster) - Turkey * Lena - Russia (Siberia) * Lishui (Li)- China * Liao - China (Manchuria) - Bohai Gulf * Marikina River - Philippines (Marikina City, Metro Manila) * Mekong - China, Laos, Myanmar, Thailand, Vietnam, Cambodia. * Mindanao - Philippines * Ob - Russia (Siberia) - Gulf of Ob of the Arctic Ocean * Om - Russia * Orontes ('Asi) - Lebanon, Syria * Pasig River - Philippines (Pasig City and Manila, Metro Manila) * Pearl River - China - South China Sea ** Lijiang * Rajang River - Malaysia - South China Sea * Red River - China, Vietnam - South China Sea * Sakarya River - Turkey * Salween - China (Tibet, Yunnan), Myanmar, Thailand - Andaman Sea * Sefid River Iran * Selenga - Russia (Siberia), Mongolia * Shatt al-Arab - Iraq, Iran - Persian Gulf ** Songhua - China (Manchuria), Russia (Siberia) * Syr Darya - Kazakhstan * Tumen River - China, North Korea, Russia - Sea of Japan * Vaigai River - India * Xi - China ** Xiang - China * Yangtze (Chang Jiang) - China - East China Sea * Yalu - North Korea, China - Korea Bay of the Yellow Sea * Yellow River (Huang He) - China - Yellow Sea * Yenisei - Russia (Siberia) * Yeşilırmak -Turkey ** Yuan- China * Yurungkash - China (Takla Makan) ** Zijiang (Zi)- China * Zeravshan - Tajikistan, Uzbekistan
title: List of rivers of Asia
